item.title: FX Market Update – Tue, 26 Aug 2025 02:22:52 GMT
item.description:
USD: DXY consolidates near 104.80 as markets await Powell at Jackson Hole.
EUR/USD: Holding 1.1420 support, resistance 1.1500.
GBP/USD: Supported near 1.3550, capped at 1.3625.
USD/JPY: Rangebound 144.20–145.00.
